content: izzy buddy boy dolls a free knitting pattern by esther braithwaite www stitchandshare weebly com materials model is knit in paintbox simply dk on 2 75mm dpns basic body work in stocking stitch throughout cast on 32 sts arrange evenly on 4 needles refer to chart or knit from pattern as from left to right simple sweater striped sweater fishbone cable sweater option a follows cable sweater option b chunky cable sweater shoes option c row 1-4 knit in black begin shaping for top of head pants row 43 k1 *knit 4 k2tog repeat from * row 5-18 knit in grey to last stitch k1 shirt see cable and stripe options row 44 and alternate even row knit below row 45 k1 * knit 3 k2tog repeat from * row 19-30 knit in green to last stitch k1 face row 47 k1 * knit 2 k2 decrease repeat from row 31-38 knit in tan *to last stich k1 hair row 49 k1 * knit 1 k2 decrease repeat from *to last stich k1 row 39-42 knit in brown row 50 k1 * k2 decrease repeat from *to last stich k1 draw yarn through remaining stitches and pull to close secure yarn this pattern is adapted from the izzy doll patterns available freely online for charity knitting the pattern is free for personal use not for sale or profit izzy buddy boy dolls a free knitting pattern by esther braithwaite www stitchandshare weebly com this pattern is adapted from the izzy doll patterns available freely online for charity knitting the pattern is free for personal use not for sale or profit izzy buddy boy dolls a free knitting pattern by esther braithwaite www stitchandshare weebly com fishbone cable sweater option a chunky cable sweater option c row 19 knit row 19 knit row 20 knit 12 purl 2 knit 4 purl 2 knit row 20 knit 12 purl 1 knit 6 purl 1 knit to end row 21 knit 12 purl 2 sl1 to cn hold in back k1 k1 from cn sl1 to cn hold in row 21 knit 12 purl 1 sl3 to cn hold in front k1 k1 from cable needle purl 2 front k3 k3 from cn purl 1 knit to end knit to end row 22-24 repeat row 20 row 22-23 repeat row 20 row 25 repeat cable row 21 row 24 repeat cable row 21 row 26-28 repeat row 20 row 25-26 repeat row 20 row 29 repeat cable row 21 row 27 repeat cable row 21 row 30 repeat row 20 row 28-29 repeat row 20 row 30 repeat cable row 21 striped sweater option d row 19-22 knit in green cable sweater option b row 23 knit in white row 19 knit row 24 knit in green row 20 knit 12 purl 2 knit 4 purl 2 knit row 25-26 knit in white to end row 27 knit in green row 21 knit 12 purl 2 sl1 to cn hold in front k3
